title: Félix MORTAS CV
description-text:
Single, 27 years old,
Driver's license, French National
exchange-madrid: School exchange in the Madrid suburbs
interest-travel-2: through travel and affinity for the cultures of
axa-job-title: Eco-responsible Digital Project Manager Apprentice - Data Scientist
axa-duration: AXA Group Operations, Paris 17 | October 2023 - April 2025 | 1.5 years
axa-task-ghg: Participation in data collection for measuring the company's digital carbon footprint according to the GHG Protocol
axa-task-awareness: Raising community awareness of the environmental impact of digital technology through various workshops (e.g.,
axa-task-ai-research: Research and development of carbon footprint measurement for generative AI (ChatGPT, Copilot, ...) in close collaboration with the "Sustainable AI" research team
axa-task-ai-tool: Implementation of an internal tool to measure the carbon footprint of generative AI
axa-task-ai-best-practices: Development of best practices for reducing GHG emissions for both end-users and developers
axa-task-water: Research and implementation of the water footprint assessment for the company's data centers
axa-task-shift-project: Contribution to generative AI research with
vu-job-meta: Vergers Urbains, Paris 18 | May 2021 - September 2023 | 2 years and 4 months
vu-exp-pollution-title: Experimentation on soil pollution in the "Jardin Espérance" in Aubervilliers:
vu-exp-pollution-item1: Literature review on phyto-immobilization of heavy metals (Zinc, Mercury)
vu-exp-pollution-item3: Supervision of participatory workshops for the setup and monitoring of the experiment (soil amendment, planting, sampling, analysis of results)
vu-tbm-item2: Supervision of members and conducting educational workshops
vu-tbm-item3: Experimentation on the best substrate for rooftop farming
vu-pepiniere-title: Development of a rooftop nursery at the
vu-resilience-desc:
Participation in the implementation of various urban agriculture projects addressing urban resilience challenges, integrating food, energy, social, and economic issues. 
Implementation inspired by agro-ecology and permaculture, following a participatory, inclusive, and reproducible approach, complementary to peri-urban agriculture.
vu-org-internal-title: Assistance with the internal organization of the association:
syngenta-task-1: Implementation of a project and portfolio management tool using SmartSheet
syngenta-task-2: Development of a showcase website for the use of the company's statistical tools
syngenta-task-3-title: Statistical analysis of the quality of all produced seed lots:
syngenta-task-3-detail-1: Linear regression and confusion matrix using Excel
syngenta-task-3-detail-2: ANOVA and box plots using RStudio
internship-spain-title: International Internship - Research Assistant in a functional biology and genomics laboratory in Spain
internship-spain-meta: University of Salamanca, Salamanca, SPAIN | April 2023 - June 2023 | 3 months
internship-spain-task1: Study of the inhibitory effect of 2 phenolic components found in pistachio leaves on the germination of 4 weed species
internship-spain-task2: Study of the inhibitory effect of plant extracts on the growth of 3 pathogenic fungi
internship-spain-task3: Study of the biostimulant effect of compost tea on tomato growth and its inhibitory effect on Fusarium
internship-spain-task4: Study of the preventive effect of compost tea on water stress in tomatoes
internship-vietnam-title: Final Year Internship - Research Assistant in a molecular biology laboratory in Vietnam
internship-vietnam-meta: Nong Lam University, Ho Chi Minh City, VIETNAM | April 2019 - June 2019 | 3 months
internship-vietnam-task1: Identification of microorganisms using molecular biology techniques (e.g., PCR)
master-ds-p1: Collection, cleaning, exploratory analysis, preparation, and modeling (supervised/unsupervised) of structured data using Python and its Data Science library suite
master-ds-p2: Implementation of processing (feature extraction, dimension reduction) and advanced modeling (traditional NLP, LLM, Computer Vision)
master-ds-p3: Model lifecycle management with MLFlow and web deployment integrating a graphical interface
master-ds-p4: Execution of distributed computing processing (PySpark) on AWS
eng-agro-subtitle: National School of Agronomy of Toulouse (ENSAT), Toulouse | September 2020 - September 2023 | 3 years
eng-agro-p1: Fundamental sciences, agronomy, ecology, urban agriculture, carbon footprinting, LCA
eng-agro-p2: Economics, marketing, project management, accounting, social and solidarity economy, innovation, corporate strategy, CSR, market research
eng-agro-p3: Statistics, modeling, physics, GIS, basic computer science
fdn-desc-1: Professional facilitator for the Digital Collage (Fresque du Numérique), a 3-hour serious game designed to raise awareness about the environmental and social impacts of digital technology.
fdn-desc-2: Capable of facilitating workshops for 16 people simultaneously in French, English, or Spanish.
treasurer-role: Treasurer of the association "Les Toits Vivants"
treasurer-desc-1: Financial tracking (sales, memberships, donations, grants, purchases, operating costs)
treasurer-desc-2: Maintaining relationships with partners and members
treasurer-desc-3: Participation in association activities (meetings, events, gardening, etc.)
footer: CV in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - January 21, 2026
